r1 *k1 m1l k until 3 sts left on the needle m1r k1* repeat ** on the other needle - r2 k all sts repeat row 1 and 2 for 5 times you now have 30 36 40 46 50 56 60 66 sts change to color a foot work in stockinette for 15-24cm ^ change this length based on how long you want your sock you can do this by trying on the sock take into consideration that the heel will add 2-4 cm to have a perfect fit knit the foot until reaching the start of the ankle alternate color a c and b c to have a three striped look you can vary the number of row between colors or make it symmetrical for the socks in pictures i knitted 4 row of color a 1 row of color c 4 row of color b and 1 row of
